short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension transfers medical notes from scribematic.ai to the user's electronic health records system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension seamlessly transfers medical notes from Scribematic.ai to your EHR (Electronic Health Records) system, streamlining documentation for healthcare professionals. Scribematic is an advanced AI scribe that actively listens to clinician-patient interactions, automatically transforming them into comprehensive medical notes.

Once notes are generated in Scribematic, clinicians can effortlessly transfer them to their practiceâ€™s EHR system with a single click using this extension. This integration allows for a significant reduction in time spent on documentation tasks compared to manual entry.

Scribematic empowers clinicians to efficiently complete medical documents while also offering the flexibility to generate custom templates tailored to clinical workflows through AI capabilities. These templates ensure consistency and accuracy across all medical records.

To utilize this extension, a Scribematic account is required. Sign up for a free account at https://scribematic.ai to explore its full potential and enhance your clinical documentation process.
